WARNING: This is my first time creating an API and it is in sort of a Beta version!
Some Endpoints do NOT have fail-safe which can and most probably will break your app :)

Api endpoints./: Contains useful information about each API endpoint

Api endpoints./v1/errors: Here all errors that I found will be redirected

Api endpoints./v1/continents/<continent_name>: Returns all countries from that continent

Api endpoints./v1/continents/<continent_name>/<country: Returns all cities belonging to that country

Api endpoints./v1/countries?continent_name=: Returns all countries from that continent

Api endpoints./v1/cities?country_name=: Returns all cities belonging to that country
